item.title: See's Candies
item.dc:creator: HomeForNow
item.content:encoded:
One of my friends just came back from several days in southern California. Before he left I asked if he could bring me some chocolates. He agreed. I gave him a list and some cash and he brought me back some See's. What a treat!

- Jessica
item.excerpt:encoded: One of my friends just came back from several days in southern California. Before he left I asked if he could bring me some chocolates. He agreed. I gave him a list and some cash and he brought me back some See's. What a treat!- Jessica
